com.noisepages.nettoyeur.bluetooth

Class DeviceListActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.noisepages.nettoyeur.bluetooth.DeviceListActivity

  • public class DeviceListActivity
extends Activity
    A simple activity that offers the user a list of paired Bluetooth devices to choose from.
